Subject: Encrypt communication
Description: The customer needs assistance to enable encrypted communication with the active directory (SSL).
What_We_Know__c: The customer enables the SSL in ADI to encrypt communication with Active Directory. The customer is using advanced hunting in Microsoft Defender and noticed LDAP with clear text.
Solution_Comment__c:
We switched the profile to the correct one and ran the scan for ADI
The issue with the encrypted communication is resolved once ADI starts working correctly.
